revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Viridian Forest |image = [[File:Viridian Forest.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Viridian Forest. |tokens = 50 |location = North of Viridian City, on Route 2. }} '''Viridian Forest''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 50 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Caterpie.png|40px]] Caterpie || [[File:Bug_Catcher.png|40px]] Bug Catcher Rick || [[File:Caterpie.png|40px]] Caterpie, [[File:Weedle.png|40px]] Weedle |- | [[File:Metapod.png|40px]] Metapod || [[File:Bug_Catcher.png|40px]] Bug Catcher Doug || [[File:Weedle.png|40px]] Weedle, [[File:Kakuna.png|40px]] Kakuna, [[File:Weedle.png|40px]] Weedle |- | [[File:Weedle.png|40px]] Weedle || [[File:Bug_Catcher.png|40px]] Bug Catcher Anthony || [[File:Caterpie.png|40px]] Caterpie, [[File:Caterpie.png|40px]] Caterpie |- | [[File:Kakuna.png|40px]] Kakuna || [[File:Bug_Catcher.png|40px]] Bug Catcher Charlie || [[File:Metapod.png|40px]] Metapod, [[File:Caterpie.png|40px]] Caterpie, [[File:Metapod.png|40px]] Metapod |- |}
